column4: I am using GutsyGibbon 64bit.  occasionally my mouse gets stuck and I have to reboot in order to regain use of my mouse.  is there any way to not reboot?
a solution as of now as im currently feeling like crap and cant think youcan save all progress and only restart X vis ctrl+alt+bckspc
